mapper.select: SELECT m.id as id,g.name as gname, m.director as director, m.mainactor as mainactor, m.releasedate as releasedate, m.posterimg1 as posterimg1,m.posterimg2 as posterimg1, m.country as country, m.runningtime as runningtime, m.text as text, COUNT(r.id) as rcnt,ROUND(AVG(r.star),1) as star FROM movie m INNER JOIN genre g ON g.id = m.gid INNER JOIN reviews r ON r.mid=m.id GROUP BY id

SELECT m.id as id, s.id as sid,s.tid as tid,s.sdate as sdate, ds.starttime as starttime, ds.endtime as endtime FROM movie m INNER JOIN schedules s ON s.mid=m.id INNER JOIN detail_schedules ds ON ds.sid = s.id
mapper.update: UPDATE movie SET gid=#{gid},title=#{title}, director=#{director}, mainactor=#{mainactor},releasedate=#{releasedate},posterimg1=#{posterimg1},posterimg2=#{posterimg2},country=#{country},runningtime=#{runningtime},text=#{text} WHERE id=#{id}
